api

Interface Universe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UniverseImpl

    public interface Universe
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Universe Interface is exposed to Server and Space.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PORT
      The port used by the RMI registry.
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
      The service name associated with this Remote interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void register(Server server)
      Register a Server in Universe.
      void register(Space space)
      Register a Space in Universe.

        static final int PORT
        The port used by the RMI registry.
        See Also:

      • SERVICE_NAME

        static final java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
        The service name associated with this Remote interface.

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(Server server)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Register a Server in Universe. Call from Server.
        Parameters:
        server - Server to be registered.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Universe.

      • register

        void register(Space space)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Register a Space in Universe. Call from Space.
        Parameters:
        space - Space to be registered.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Universe.
